## Welcome {.unnumbered}

::: {.callout-important}
## Update your system {.unnumbered}

Having an up-to-date environment is a **prerequisite** for all FRB-CESAB training courses. Please
**update your whole system** (operating system, software and {{< fa brands r-project >}} packages) **before starting the course**!
:::


This guide will help you install, set up and update a working environment for data science in {{< fa brands r-project >}} (and others) required for FRB-CESAB training courses.
